p: From our study, the highest significant variable associated with dengue incidences is the positive 1-week-lag dengue cases in most of the provinces in Thailand, except in Phichit, Sukhothai, Si Sa Ket, Chachoengsao, Trat, Pathum Thani, Prachin Buri, Rayong, Krabi, and Ranong provinces. The best-fit model for all provinces contains some weather factors.
